rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0001
rows.name: I want to be a Driver when I grow up!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0002
rows.name:
My dad, my mom, everyone around me
is against it, but I don't care!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0003
rows.name:
An active Driver is training me, and he's
taught me a lot of tips!

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0004
rows.name:
He says Blades are good at using all kinds
of weapons, like Ether Cannons,
Hammers, Lances, and so on.

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Each one has a different role, so the Driver
has to change how they fight to match
their Blade.

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0006
rows.name:
For example, when using a Hammer, you have to
build up enemy hate and take their attacks...

rows.label: tlk41200123_01_msg0007
rows.name: Being a Driver is surprisingly tough.
